name: VIONIQ
overview:
VIONIQ is a video game platform that rewards the gamer for their highlights.

Vioniq is a platform that runs contests for gameplay highlights. The rewards vary from gaming gear, games and cash. The purpose of Vioniq is to reward gamers who spend hours playing their favorite video games and give them the recognition they deserve. Contests are run to encourage competition and give gamers rewards for winning. Users are encouraged to join contests and share their videos to gain votes, views and be recognized as an elite gamer.

VIONIQ promotes videos on their page and social channels. This helps get gamers more attention and recognition in the gaming community. The Vioniq staff creates bi-weekly “Top 10 Countdowns” with their favorite videos. These “Top 10’s” promote their favorite contest entries before voting is over. Then a winner is chosen by the Vioniq staff and is chosen based on number of votes, number of views and overal contest entry.

The winning gamer is contacted by the VIONIQ team regarding their reward.

VIONIQ is currently in beta.
